title: WTA International, Budapest Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: February 25, 2018 / 6:32 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago WTA International, Budapest Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Feb 25 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the WTA International, Budapest Women's Singles matches on Sunday ..
